name: Josaphat Speaking to the Merchant Barlaam about the Precious Gem
maker: Follower of Hans Schilling, from the Workshop of Diebold Lauber
description: Josaphat Speaking to the Merchant Barlaam about the Precious Gem; Follower of Hans Schilling (German, active 1459 - 1467), from the Workshop of Diebold Lauber (German, active 1427 - 1467); Hagenau, Alsace, France (formerly Germany); 1469; Ink, colored washes, and tempera colors on paper; Leaf: 28.6 x 20.3 cm (11 1/4 x 8 in.); Ms. Ludwig XV 9, fol. 43v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
